+# Section represents the jupyter page to which the extension will be applied to

nodes.bodyText: you mean the section? yes, if i just pass the script it gets loaded only for the jupyter notebook page. In order for it to be loaded/enabled on the jupyter tree section (where it list files etc) it needs to mention the section https://nbgrader.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user_guide/installation.html
